[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Dimrill Stair.jpg|thumb|250px|Dimrill Stair in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
The '''Dimrill Stair''' was the name given to the southeastern part of the [[Redhorn Gate]], leading down into [[Dimrill Dale]]. It was named the Dimrill Stair because of the sequence of waterfalls that led down into the lake of [[Mirrormere]].<ref>{{FR|II6}}</ref>

== Portrayal in adaptations ==
'''2008: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Dimrill Stair is a prominent waterfall dropping into the [[Mirrormere]].
